Rule.Filter: ([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road' or ( [tracktype]='grade1' and [highway]='track')) and not ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')

([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road' or ( [tracktype]='grade1' and [highway]='track')) and ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')

([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road' or ( [tracktype]='grade1' and [highway]='track')) and not ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')

([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road' or ( [tracktype]='grade1' and [highway]='track')) and ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')

([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road' or ( [tracktype]='grade1' and [highway]='track')) and not ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')

([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road' or ( [tracktype]='grade1' and [highway]='track')) and ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')

([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road' or ( [tracktype]='grade1' and [highway]='track')) and not ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')

([highway] = 'tertiary' or [highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road' or ( [tracktype]='grade1' and [highway]='track')) and ([tunnel] = 'yes' or [tunnel] = 'true' or [tunnel] = '1')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway' ) and ([sac_scale]='demanding_mountain_hiking' or [sac_scale]='alpine_hiking') and (not [trail_visibility]='intermediate' and not [trail_visibility]='horrible' and not [trail_visibility]='bad' and not [trail_visibility]='no')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway') and ([sac_scale]='demanding_alpine_hiking' or [sac_scale]='difficult_alpine_hiking') and (not [trail_visibility]='intermediate' and not [trail_visibility]='horrible' and not [trail_visibility]='bad' and not [trail_visibility]='no')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway') and (not [sac_scale]='demanding_mountain_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='alpine_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='demanding_alpine_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='difficult_alpine_hiking')
and (not [trail_visibility]='intermediate' and not [trail_visibility]='horrible' and not [trail_visibility]='bad' and not [trail_visibility]='no')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway') and not ([tunnel] = 'yes') and ([sac_scale]='demanding_mountain_hiking' or [sac_scale]='alpine_hiking') and ([trail_visibility]='intermediate' or [trail_visibility]='bad' or [trail_visibility]='horrible' or [trail_visibility]='no')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway') and not ([tunnel] = 'yes') and ([sac_scale]='demanding_alpine_hiking' or [sac_scale]='difficult_alpine_hiking') and ([trail_visibility]='intermediate' or [trail_visibility]='bad' or [trail_visibility]='horrible' or [trail_visibility]='no')

([highway] = 'footway' or [highway] = 'path' or [highway] = 'bridleway') and (not [sac_scale]='demanding_mountain_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='alpine_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='demanding_alpine_hiking' and not [sac_scale]='difficult_alpine_hiking')
and ([trail_visibility]='intermediate' or [trail_visibility]='horrible' or [trail_visibility]='bad' or [trail_visibility]='no')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([bridge] = 'yes' or [bridge] = 'true' or [bridge] = '1')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([bridge] = 'yes' or [bridge] = 'true' or [bridge] = '1')
([highway] = 'residential' or [highway] = 'minor' or [highway] = 'unclassified' or [highway] = 'road') and ([bridge] = 'yes' or [bridge] = 'true' or [bridge] = '1')

Datasource.Parameter: (select * from planet_osm_polygon order by z_order,way_area desc) as leisure
(select * from planet_osm_polygon where waterway IS NOT NULL or landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' or "natural"='land' order by z_order) as water_areas
(select * from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NOT NULL or "natural" is not null order by z_order) as water_lines
(select * from planet_osm_line order by z_order) as roads
(select way,smoothness from planet_osm_line where highway='track' and (bridge is null or bridge in ('no','false','0')) and (tunnel is null or tunnel in ('no','false','0'))) as tracks
(select way,tracktype from planet_osm_line where highway='track' and tunnel in ('yes','true','1')) as tracks
(select * from planet_osm_line order by z_order) as roads
(select * from planet_osm_roads order by z_order) as roads
(select * from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NOT NULL or landuse='reservoir' or landuse='water' or "natural"='lake' or "natural"='water' order by z_order) as water
(select * from planet_osm_line order by z_order) as roads
(select way,tracktype from planet_osm_line where highway='track' and bridge in ('yes','true','1')) as tracks
(select * from planet_osm_line where "railway"='tram' order by z_order) as trams

(select * from planet_osm_point where amenity IS NOT NULL or tourism is NOT NULL or railway is NOT NULL or "natural" is NOT NULL or man_made is NOT NULL or highway is NOT NULL or aeroway is NOT NULL or power_source is NOT NULL) as amenity
(select way from planet_osm_line where "power"='line') as power
(select way from planet_osm_point where power='tower') as power_towers
(select way,highway,landuse,"natural",man_made,waterway,name,ref,char_length(ref) as length from planet_osm_line where waterway IS NULL and leisure IS NULL and landuse IS NULL) as roads

(select way,highway,landuse,"natural",man_made,waterway,tourism,amenity,place,name,ref,char_length(ref) as length from planet_osm_line where boundary is NULL and leisure is NULL and waterway IS NULL and landuse IS NULL) as roads
(select name,way_area,way,military,tourism,ele from planet_osm_polygon where name is not null and boundary is null order by z_order,way_area desc) as leisure
(select way,admin_level from planet_osm_roads where "boundary"='administrative' and admin_level in ('2','4','6') ) as admin
(select * from planet_osm_polygon where boundary='national_park' or leisure='nature_reserve' or (boundary='protected_area' and protect_id in ('1' ,'2','3','4') ) ) as protected_area
